API
Payments and reports to take away, please.

Flime API (Application Programming Interface) - a set of methods and queries that help you to integrate the full Flime functionality into your IT infrastructure.

Flime API streamlines task-based payment processes and paperwork and brings it to your preferred software.

Join a seamless integration for your platform with our robust and clean API methods. Issue large batch payments with more ease and accuracy. Eliminate manual transfer errors.

API Documentation will be available soon.
